thread.title: No Christian Atsu and Andre Ayew in 2015 FIFA Ballon d'Or nominees
thread.title_full: No Christian Atsu and Andre Ayew in 2015 FIFA Ballon d'Or nominees

title: No Christian Atsu and Andre Ayew in 2015 FIFA Ballon d'Or nominees
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 10:40 CET No Christian Atsu and Andre Ayew in 2015 FIFA Ballon d'Or nominees - www.ghanasoccernet.com Andre Ayew 
FIFA have released the 23-man shortlist for the 2015 Ballon d'Or with Yaya Toure being the only African on the list. 
Earlier reports claimed Ghana stars Christian Atsu and Andre Ayew was in the preliminary list but the England-based duo could not make the cut. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
